title: Make a way to block people in the new client
body: There is no way to block people in the new client unless you have them on your friends list first, which lets face it people you want to block probably wont be on your friends list. The old client had a way to do this and I used it all the time. I ended up in games with people I blocked before and the auto mute made the game better. This is a feature that needs to come back.

replies.body: It looks like you can only block members on your friends list currently, and other blocking tools aren't available yet.  In the meantime, you can continue using block tools through the legacy client.  I don't have any details on when new features would be added, but free to share any feedback over at the [client ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards.  Thanks for testing!

Just in case someone hasn't figured this out yet, there is a way! Right click on their summoner icon and then click block! If it doesn't work right after the game, got to your match history and it should work! Hopefully this helped!

There is a way to block anyone u want as long as you know their name in game. 1) you go to their profile. 2) you go to their match history. 3) click in to open one  of the last games they played. 4) Right click on their name and there is a block option.
